base: LG-174 (Landing Ground 174), Egypt (16 Sep - 5 Nov 1942); RAF El Daba/LG-105 (5-8 Nov 1942); Sidi Haneish Airfield (8-12 Nov 1942)

metadata.notes: HYBRID SOURCE VALIDATION: This extraction uses Wikipedia and military history wikis for unit identification, parent formation, battle participation, and timeline. Specific P-40F-1-CU variant confirmed through P-40 specialist sources. GAPS: Squadron commander name not found in available sources. Personnel numbers estimated based on standard USAAF fighter squadron TO&E. Operational sortie counts estimated from group-level operations. TIER 1/2 VALIDATION: Aircraft variant (P-40F-1) confirmed through P-40 specialist sources and production records. Bases confirmed through multiple secondary sources. Battle participation (El Alamein, Libyan Pursuit) confirmed through multiple sources including official USAAF histories.
